sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( LOTQ_CORP_CODE ,LOTQ_STND_GUBN ,LOTQ_VEHL_GUBN ,LOTQ_INDS_CODE ,LOTQ_COME_CODE ,LOTQ_APPL_DATE ,LOTQ_SEQ0 ,LOTQ_PROD_MIN0 ,LOTQ_PROD_MAX0 ,LOTQ_PROD_NAME ,LOTQ_LOTQ_NAME ,LOTQ_DETL_NAME1 ,LOTQ_DETL_NAME2 ,LOTQ_QTY0 ,LOTQ_UPDT_DATE ,LOTQ_UPDT_CMAN ,LOTQ_INIT_DATE ,LOTQ_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1' ,'H' ,'P' ,'RB' ,'HOSE' ,'20150101' ,'1177' ,'0' ,'9999999999' ,'∼9999999999' ,'일반HOSE' ,'ALL' ,'ALL' ,'2000' ,'20160101' ,'SYSTEM' ,'20160101' ,'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1' ,'H' ,'P' ,'RB' ,'HOSE' ,'20200101' ,'3001' ,'0' ,'200' ,'∼200' ,'일반HOSE' ,'ALL' ,'ALL' ,'200' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1' ,'H' ,'P' ,'RB' ,'HOSE' ,'20200101' ,'3002' ,'200' ,'300' ,'∼300' ,'일반HOSE' ,'ALL' ,'ALL' ,'400' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1' ,'H' ,'P' ,'RB' ,'HOSE' ,'20200101' ,'3003' ,'300' ,'400' ,'∼400' ,'일반HOSE' ,'ALL' ,'ALL' ,'600' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1' ,'H' ,'P' ,'RB' ,'HOSE' ,'20200101' ,'3004' ,'400' ,'500' ,'∼500' ,'일반HOSE' ,'ALL' ,'ALL' ,'800' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1' ,'H' ,'P' ,'RB' ,'HOSE' ,'20200101' ,'3005' ,'500' ,'10000' ,'∼10,000' ,'일반HOSE' ,'ALL' ,'ALL' ,'1000' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1' ,'H' ,'P' ,'RB' ,'HOSE' ,'20200101' ,'3006' ,'10000' ,'15000' ,'∼15,000' ,'일반HOSE' ,'ALL' ,'ALL' ,'1200' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1' ,'H' ,'P' ,'RB' ,'HOSE' ,'20200101' ,'3007' ,'15000' ,'20000' ,'∼20,000' ,'일반HOSE' ,'ALL' ,'ALL' ,'1700' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1' ,'H' ,'P' ,'RB' ,'HOSE' ,'20200101' ,'3008' ,'20000' ,'9999999999' ,'2만 초과' ,'일반HOSE' ,'ALL' ,'ALL' ,'2000' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' ,'20200501' ,'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.XXXX_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.XXXX_UPDT_DATE > B.XXXX_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBLOTQ B ON B.LOTQ_CORP_CODE = A.LOTQ_CORP_CODE AND B.LOTQ_STND_GUBN = A.LOTQ_STND_GUBN AND B.LOTQ_VEHL_GUBN = A.LOTQ_VEHL_GUBN AND B.LOTQ_INDS_CODE = A.LOTQ_INDS_CODE AND B.LOTQ_COME_CODE = A.LOTQ_COME_CODE AND B.LOTQ_APPL_DATE = A.LOTQ_APPL_DATE AND B.LOTQ_SEQ0 = A.LOTQ_SEQ0

UPDATE CITBLOTQ SET LOTQ_PROD_MIN0 = #lotq_prod_min0# ,LOTQ_PROD_MAX0 = #lotq_prod_max0# ,LOTQ_PROD_NAME = #lotq_prod_name# ,LOTQ_LOTQ_NAME = #lotq_lotq_name# ,LOTQ_DETL_NAME1 = #lotq_detl_name1# ,LOTQ_DETL_NAME2 = #lotq_detl_name2# ,LOTQ_QTY0 = #lotq_qty0# ,LOTQ_UPDT_DATE = #lotq_updt_date# ,LOTQ_UPDT_CMAN = #lotq_updt_cman# WHERE LOTQ_CORP_CODE = #lotq_corp_code# AND LOTQ_STND_GUBN = #lotq_stnd_gubn# AND LOTQ_VEHL_GUBN = #lotq_vehl_gubn# AND LOTQ_INDS_CODE = #lotq_inds_code# AND LOTQ_COME_CODE = #lotq_come_code# AND LOTQ_APPL_DATE = #lotq_appl_date# AND LOTQ_SEQ0 = #lotq_seq0#
